home.title: Learn Bitcoin & Web3, Made Simple
home.subtitle: Understanding Bitcoin and Web3 doesn't have to be complicated. We break down complex concepts into simple, easy-to-understand lessons perfect for absolute beginners.
home.whatYoullLearnDesc: Our lessons cover everything from the basics of Bitcoin to understanding the broader Web3 ecosystem.
home.bitcoinBasicsDesc: Learn what Bitcoin is, how it works, and why it matters in simple terms.
home.blockchainExplainedDesc: Understand the technology behind Bitcoin and how blockchains work.
home.web3FundamentalsDesc: Explore the decentralized web and how it differs from the internet you know.
home.digitalWalletsDesc: Learn about digital wallets and how to safely store cryptocurrency.
home.smartContractsDesc: Discover how smart contracts work and their real-world applications.
home.decentralizationDesc: Understand what decentralization means and why it matters.
home.howItWorksDesc: Our learning journey is designed to be simple and accessible.
home.step1Desc: We begin with fundamental concepts, assuming you have zero prior knowledge of Bitcoin or Web3.
home.step2Desc: Complex ideas are explained using simple analogies, visual diagrams, and real-world examples.
home.step3Desc: Each lesson builds on the previous one, gradually expanding your knowledge of the Web3 world.
home.step4Desc: Apply what you learn and explore further resources to deepen your understanding.
home.readyToStartDesc: Begin your journey into Bitcoin and Web3 with our first lesson, designed specifically for beginners.

about.title: About Web3 Learn
about.subtitle: Making Bitcoin and Web3 education accessible to everyone, one simple explanation at a time.
about.missionText1: Bitcoin and Web3 technologies represent one of the most significant innovations of our time. However, the complexity of these concepts often creates barriers that prevent people from understanding and participating in this new digital economy.
about.missionText2: Our mission is to break down these barriers by providing clear, simple, and accessible educational content. We believe that everyone, regardless of their technical background or prior knowledge, should have the opportunity to understand Bitcoin and Web3.
about.missionText3: Whether you're a complete beginner, a student, or someone simply curious about these technologies, we're here to guide you on your learning journey.
about.simplicityFirstDesc: We believe that complex concepts can be explained simply without losing their essence. Every lesson is designed to be understood by someone with zero prior knowledge.
about.visualLearningDesc: We use diagrams, illustrations, and visual metaphors to help you understand abstract concepts. A picture is worth a thousand words, especially when learning something new.
about.accessibilityForAllDesc: Our content is designed to be accessible to everyone, including those using assistive technologies. We follow WCAG guidelines to ensure our website is usable by all learners.
about.noJargonDesc: We avoid technical jargon whenever possible. When we must use technical terms, we explain them immediately in simple language.
about.whatMakesDifferentText1: Many resources about Bitcoin and Web3 assume you already have a background in computer science, cryptography, or economics. We don't.
about.whatMakesDifferentText2: Our content is specifically designed for absolute beginners. We start from the very beginning, using analogies and simple language to explain concepts that might seem intimidating elsewhere.
about.whatMakesDifferentText3: We're committed to creating an inclusive learning environment where everyone feels welcome, regardless of their age, technical background, or prior knowledge.
about.readyToStartDesc: Begin your journey with our beginner-friendly blog posts designed to make Bitcoin and Web3 concepts easy to understand.
